summary: CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL LETTER  ON THE MICROWAVE SAMSUN  MODEL MR5491G. THE RECALL LETTER INDICATED A PHONE NUMBER TO CALL TO ARRANGE  FOR A TECHNICIAN TO FIX MICROWAVE.  CONSUMER  HAD TO DRIVE 75 MILES FROM WHERE HE RESIDED. VEHICLE HAD  ALREADY BEEN WINTERIZED AND  COST A LOT MONEY. *AK
